elements: They remember who I am. [Mystique will face quickly, but it may attract the attention of the authorities.]
They remember what I've done. [Notoriety will fade over time, but more slowly than Mystique. It may attract the attention of the authorities.]
A hunter has found evidence - real or imagined - of my sins. [Hunters with Evidence become more dangerous.]
'Earth, gape!  O, no, it will not harbour me!' [With Damning Evidence, the Suppression Bureau will be able to convict you. Evidence is permanent unless destroyed.]
